backgrounds.description: Experience producing user guides, release notes, structured content, UX writing, and knowledge base documentation.
Writing UX copy, tooltips, error messages, empty states, and product microcopy within Figma and agile teams.
Academic training in software development, programming, and IT systems.

jobs.title: Technical Writer
responsibilities: Embedded in agile product squads from kickoff through release; author UX copy in Figma including tooltips, error messages, empty states, and microcopy.
Create structured content using DITA XML with strong focus on reuse, metadata, and search optimization.
Write user guides and documentation that integrate with chatbot and contextual help systems.
Collaborate with customer support to create how-to guides, FAQs, and troubleshooting articles.
Own release documentation including feature notes, enhancement summaries, and bug lists.
Partner with Gen AI team to design and implement an internal Release Notes Generator.
Maintain and modernize legacy content to align with current functionality and style guidelines.
Drive consistency and usability across customer-facing and internal documentation.

jobs.title: Technical Writer
responsibilities: Produced and edited mechanical illustrations using SolidWorks Composer and Adobe Illustrator.
Created operator manuals, installation guides, video scripts, and knowledge base documentation.
Collaborated with engineering and technical support teams to translate complex concepts into plain language.
Participated in machine demonstrations and SME interviews.
Collaborated with external software teams to design a new knowledge portal.

jobs.title: Technical Writer Intern
responsibilities: Produced online FAQs, Quick Start Guides, and support documentation for product launches.
Reviewed documentation projects for clarity, completeness, and branding consistency.
Collaborated with QA and Product Management to simplify complex technical concepts.
